room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: Challenging enough to make it a truly enjoyable experience with friends! We felt the stakes rise as time was running out. Will was a great game master! Definitely coming back for more rooms run by him!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: I have been twice now and it has been a blast both times. Game masters are very friendly and seem to enjoy working there. A great way to get together with friends or family. Fun for all ages!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: Breakout Games was our first escape room we ever tried and it was a BLAST!!! My husband, daughter, her fianc√© and I booked the Mystery Mansion Room and although we did not make it out we were very close. Drew was our host, he was friendly and a lot of fun. We will definitely be back again!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: Eight of our group of friends did the Mansion game. Allison was our host and did a great job. It was super challenging but we had a great time! The location is convenient with an immense parking lot. The lobby was very basic but had seating and a coat rack. The staff was professional and friendly.Would go back and plan to try to get my teen to do it. I think they would get more business if they lowered the price a little.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: This is SUCH an awesome experience! The staff is so friendly and the atmosphere was so cool! We will definitely be back to experience another room!
